731415f-a.title: Colleges and Universities - College of the City of New York.
731415f-a.text:
College of the City of New York: The Main Building, on the east side of Convent Avenue between I38th and I40th Streets, seen
from the campus.
George L. Balgue  May. 1911
731415f-a.folder: Convent Avenue and 138th Street, Manhattan, N.Y.
